text: The University of Manitoba Hemp Awareness Committee (UMHAC) was founded by Martin Moravcik, Meera Sarin, Wayne Potoroka and Gil Maguet.INDUSTRIAL AND NUTRITIONAL HEMP IN MANITOBA: A CASE STUDY ] | Page 61 | Date August 2012 Manitoba Hemp Alliance (MHA) lobbied government officials and organized support for hemp. The MHA also convinced the Manitoba government to permit the first scientific research into hemp in Manitoba after its 50-year ban.INDUSTRIAL AND NUTRITIONAL HEMP IN MANITOBA: A CASE STUDY ] | Page 19 | Date August 2012 ==References== Category:University of Manitoba category:Cannabis in Manitoba Category:Hemp
title: University of Manitoba Hemp Awareness Committee
